title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 200.9 - Recognition
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 200.9 - Recognition

State Regulations

The term
recognition, as used in this

Chapter, shall mean the designation of an employee organization as negotiating
representative of employees in an agreed-upon unit by a government not acting
through an impartial agency pursuant to section
206.1
or section 212 of the
act. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4
ยง
200.9

Amended

New

York State Register August 2, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 31, eff. 8/2/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
